features: THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING OUR SMALL BUSINESS! We appreciate every customer and we look forward to continuing our efforts to develop and bring new medciated skincare products to all of you. The 111MedCo Team
BETA HYDROXY ACID: Salicylic acid is a naturally occurring beta hydroxy acid (BHA), found in willow tree bark. It gently exfoliates by softening skin cells, making them easier to remove.

GENTLE EXFOLIATION: We do not use harsh abrasives in our formulation. This bar does not contain plastic microbeads, ground fruit pits, etc. This bar relies on the gentle skin exfoliation properties of 2% salicylic acid.

WHY TO LOVE BAR SOAP: Simple to use, less waste. No plastic, when you use up a bar of soap it’s just gone. Being a dry bar of soap, all it needs for packaging is paper. Bar soaps are lighter and last longer; it takes nine times more energy to transport liquid soap than bar soap.
body.description: Manufactured in an FDA Registered facility that is GMP Certified. 2% Salicylic Acid Cleansing Soap Bar - Made in USA - Not tested on animals - Vegan friendly - No artificial colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described and expected.
reviews.reviewText: I tried this product because of my positive experience with the company's benzoyl peroxide bar.This salicylic acid bar lathers quickly and easily, a little goes a long way. Easy to wash with, no strong odor, feels slick while washing but leaves no detectable residue. Once dried, my skin feels completely free of everything but the skin itself. I haven't experienced any excessive dryness (but I also use a moisturizer on my face after I wash). All in all an effective, inexpensive, seemingly well made bar. Thus far I'm pleased with this company's products. I'll keep buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been ordering this product for a few months now it works amazingDoesn’t dry out my skin at allReally controls and fights future dirty poresDoesn’t really smell like anythingYou won’t smell amazing but your skin will definitely feel incredible!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well, no notable difference in skin, but do feel nice & clean after using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it now!
reviews.reviewText: Have acne buy it its my second time buying. It is an amazing soap. I only use it on acne prone body parts. (Under arms and between legs) it helps so much and leaves me feeling super clean. Not really sure why some ppl feel slimy? Works great for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for skin!
reviews.reviewText: This soap is good for skin and doesn't cause drying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don't think this is for me. I still felt greasy afterwards and not super clean. But I did not breakout too much or have any other reaction so this could be good for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As a triathlete, I am always looking for something to clean and exfoliate my skin after a long day of training. My dermatologist suggested trying this bar of soap. After a few days, I noticed it did the job, but wasn't harsh on my skin. It did a great job and I highly recommend it.
